snippet: Mark Spina and Bev Sheehan merged their companies, the Theater Project and What Exit? The new company will stage “Miss Witherspoon,” a comedy that runs April 12 to 29.
abstract: Mark Spina, artistic director of the Theater Project in Cranston, and Bev Sheehan, artistic director of What Exit? in Maplewood, have merged their companies under the Theater Project name; new company will mount production of Christopher Durang play Miss Witherspoon, starring Sheehan, in April (Metropolitan/New Jersey).
lead_paragraph: Mark Spina and Bev Sheehan merged their companies, the Theater Project and What Exit? The new company will stage “Miss Witherspoon,” a comedy that runs April 12 to 29.

headline.seo: The Theater Project and What Exit? Merge, and Stage a Show About Rebirth
headline.main: After a Merger, a Show About Rebirth
headline.print_headline: After a Merger, A Show About Rebirth
